H0.text: Metamorphosis is the physical transformation that an insect undergoes as it moves through its stages of life.

H1.text: Transition is the physical transformation of an insect moving through stages of life.

H2.text: Growth and Development is the physical transformation of an insect moving through stages of life.

H3.text: Parthenogenesis is the physical transformation of an insect moving through stages of life.

A4.text: Metamorphosis is a biological process by which an animal physically develops including birth transformation or hatching, involving a conspicuous and relatively abrupt change in the animal's body structure through cell growth and differentiation.

A5.text: During metamorphosis the organism loses larval characteristics.
